sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"相似的，类似的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: alike, like, similar, comparable, parallel, uniform, identical
means: alike ：指事物在性质、特征或外貌上固有的而不是偶然的相似。普通用词，只作表语。
like ：普通用词，含义广泛，指多个或全部特性都相似，但并非同一个，也可指在某个特殊的偶然相似。
similar ：强调不同的人或事物之间完全或部分相似，暗示可暂不考虑或无视其差异之处。
comparable ：指在某一点或几点上有相似之处，可作有限或粗略的对比，尤指在价值或能力等方面可相提并论。
parallel ：主要指在外表或在性质上相似到有可以相提并论的程度。
uniform ：指在性质、数量、形态或程度等方面相似到很难看出差异的地步。
identical ：语气最强，可指同一个人或物，也可指数个人或物之间完全没有差别。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"相同的"之意。
means: same ： 可指相同的人或物，也可指在质量、外表或意义等方面相同，但实际上有差别的事物。
identical ： 着重指人或物等在每细节上都完全相同。
very ： 侧重指完全同一，没有区别。
equal ： 多指在价值等方面相当而不相同的事物。
equivalent ： 主要指有同样价值、效力或意义的两种不同的事物。

sentence.Network_en: The identical treatment of such dissimilar items is totally illogical.
sentence.Network_cn: 对如此不同的东西用一模一样的处理方法是完全不合逻辑的。

sentence.Network_en: The two parties fought the last election on almost identical manifestos.
sentence.Network_cn: 两个政党以几乎完全相同的竞选宣言参加了上次竞选。

sentence.Network_en: A coral reef is built by the accretion of tiny, identical organisms.
sentence.Network_cn: 珊瑚礁是由许多相同的微生物不断堆积而成。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in sense 2): from medieval Latin identicus, from late Latin identitas (see identity)

entry.def: Things that are identical are exactly the same.

example.ex: Nearly all the houses were identical...
example.tran: 几乎所有的房子都一模一样。

example.ex: The two parties fought the last election on almost identical manifestos.
example.tran: 两个政党以几乎完全相同的竞选宣言参加了上次竞选。

means.word_mean: 1. exactly alike; incapable of being perceived as different;

sentences.sentence: "cars identical except for their license plates"

means.word_mean: 2. being the exact same one; not any other:;

sentences.sentence: "this is the identical room we stayed in before"
"the themes of his stories are one and the same"
"saw the selfsame quotation in two newspapers"
"the very man I want to see"

means.word_mean: 3. (of twins) derived from a single egg or ovum;
4. having properties with uniform values along all axes

auth_sentence.content: That is why composition of all Suns are identical.
auth_sentence.res_content: That is why composition of all Suns are identical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is why composition of all Suns are identical.

auth_sentence.content: Men and women look similar, but not identical.
auth_sentence.res_content: Men and women look similar, but not identical.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Men and women look similar, but not identical.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ident相同,识别+ical……的→adj.同一的, 同样的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辨认, 鉴定, 证明, 视为同一

stems_affixes.word_buile: ident相同,识别+ify表动词→v.识别, 鉴别,确定

Sentence.sentence: Among the kinds of social gestures most significant for second-language teachers are those which are identical in form but different in meaning in the two cultures.
Social learning theories also don't explain why reinforcement and modeling work for some children but not others, especially those in the same family and even identical twins.
Two strains of the disease, with almost identical symptoms, affected humans-Ebola-Zaire and Ebola-Sudan.

sentences.en: She wore the identical dress on both occasions.
sentences.cn: 她在两种场合穿的是同一件衣服。

jushi.english: Both events happened on the identical day.
jushi.chinese: 两件事都发生在同一天。

jushi.english: She wore the identical dress on both occasions.
jushi.chinese: 她在两种场合穿的是同一件衣服。

jushi.english: The fingerprints of no two persons are identical .
jushi.chinese: 没有两个人的指纹完全相同。
